Description.Text: The Thief is a contemporary 5-star superior hotel offering luxury accommodation in the heart of Oslo. Highlights include a contemporary art gallery, onsite dining, free Wi-Fi and an excellent waterfront location. Tjuvholmen is the cityâs new arts and business district home to contemporary art and good city living on the waterâs edge. Nearby places of interest include the Astrup Fearnley museum as well as international restaurants and high-quality galleries. Aker Brygge tram stop is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Oslo destinations. The hotel occupies a contemporary building featuring a curved design and prominent use of glass. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 24sqm and showcase a contemporary decor with warm, beige, brown and gold tones. They boast floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony. Amenities include a flat-screen TV with on-demand content, an iPod dock, work desk and Nespresso coffee machine. The en-suite bathrooms feature a shower, bathrobes and slippers. The restaurant serves contemporary cuisine in a sophisticated space. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
